body.p:
Lebanon Ky July 20th 1865
To his Excellency Thomas E. Bramlette
Govenor of Kentucky:

Enclosed please find petition of five hundred subscribers citizens of Washington County praying the benefits of your pardon in behalf of one Preston Prather -- a citizen of Washington County Ky -- charged in inditement, with the Killing of one Thomas Colter -- &c The subscribers are citizens living in the immediate vicinity of where the offence was committed and doubtless understand fully the circumstances of the case -- Hoping that this petition may be favourably entertained

I have the honor to be very Respectfully
Your Obt. Servt
Geo W. Riley
